event_name: Trump threatens to invade Panama Canal
blurb: President Trump continues his narrative around the Panama Canal, suggesting the US will take it back by military force if needed
body: President Trump continues his narrative around the Panama Canal, suggesting the US will take it back by military force if needed

event_name: ECB likely to cut rates at next summit
blurb: European Central Bank will likely cut interest rates by 25 basis points at their next meeting in March, according to an insider who did not wish to be named
body: European Central Bank will likely cut interest rates by 25 basis points at their next meeting in March, according to an insider who did not wish to be named
